title: Filecoin Gains 2% Alongside Crypto Rally
contentSnippet: The token tracked broader crypto sentiment on below-average volume, establishing an ascending trend.

title: Ethereum's 'Fusaka' Upgrade Cements Network's Role as On-Chain Finance Settlement Layer: Bitwise
contentSnippet: The upgrade will boost throughput, keep validators efficient and, most importantly, strengthen Ethereum's value capture by putting a floor under blob fees.

title: IREN refuels balance sheet with $3.6 billion financing as AI-cloud buildout accelerates
contentSnippet: The refinancing removes a major dilution overhang for IREN by canceling older notes that converted at prices far below current levels.

title: Polymarket begins opening US app to users on the waitlist
contentSnippet: The CFTC banned Polymarket from operating in the U.S. in 2022 for operating an unregistered derivatives exchange.

title: The Protocol: Ethereum Preps For Upcoming Fusaka Upgrade
contentSnippet: Also: Anthropic On DeFi AI Agents, ETH Devs Push ZK Protocol, and Bitnomial

title: Trump's CFTC, FDIC Picks Closer to Taking Over Agencies as They Advance in Senate
contentSnippet: The Senate's process is inching forward on a mass-confirmation that would include two nominations with major crypto implications.

title: Bitcoin Futures Return to Deepest 'Backwardation' Since FTX Collapse Hinting Possible Bottom
contentSnippet: So-called "backwardation" — a futures price curve moving lower in value as time gets further out — can be read as a measure of stress in the market.

title: Firelight Introduces XRP Staking for DeFi Insurance Layer Against Exploits
contentSnippet: The new protocol, developed by Sentora and Flare Network, aims to combine XRP yield opportunity with offering protection against DeFi hacks.

title: ETHZilla Buys 20% of AI Lending Platform Karus in $10M Deal to Tokenize Auto Loans
contentSnippet: The companies plan to tokenize auto loans, with the first portfolios expected to be available by early 2026.

title: Stellar Climbs 2% as Volume Spikes Signal Institutional Interest
contentSnippet: Trading activity jumps 37% above weekly average despite modest price gains.

title: Ostium Raises $20M Series A Led by General Catalyst, Jump Crypto to Put TradFi Perps Onchain
contentSnippet: Built on Arbitrum, the perpetuals protocol has processed $25 billion in trading volume by offering self-custodial bets on gold, FX and other real-world markets.

title: HBAR Edges Higher as Vanguard ETF Access Expands Institutional Appeal
contentSnippet: Hedera gains on elevated volume while establishing support above $0.1427 during measured advance that coincides with significant institutional developments.

title: Eric Trump’s American Bitcoin Steadies After ‘First Major Unlock' of Shares
contentSnippet: The stock was volatile after insiders took profits.

title: Harvard alumni-founded Ostium lands $24 million in fresh funding to scale onchain perpetuals for RWAs
contentSnippet: RWA-focused protocol Ostium has raised $24 million to scale its decentralized perpetuals exchange beyond U.S. markets.

title: Bitcoin market fears are overblown as policy shifts open medium-term upside, K33 says
contentSnippet: Upcoming U.S. policy changes, 401(k) access, and pro-crypto regulatory momentum create a stronger medium-term backdrop for bitcoin, K33 said.

title: Bitcoin back above $92K, BlackRock bullish on a tokenized future, Kalshi raise $11B - Daily Crypto Recap
contentSnippet:
Your Decrypt daily recap with @tyler_did_it for December 3rd 2025

Today’s headlines: BTC jumps back above $92K, BlackRock bullish on tokenized assets, Kalshi raise $11B, & more

title: Opera, Celo Scale Up Partnership to 'Make Stablecoins Useful' For Millions of Users
contentSnippet: The two firms are extending their partnership with new features and an expansion into global markets amid rising stablecoin use on MiniPay.

title: Sony's Blockchain Partner Launches Institutional-Grade Stablecoin for Soneium
contentSnippet: Institutional-grade dollar stablecoin USDSC has gone live on Soneium, as Japan advances yen stablecoin trials.

title: Morning Minute: Bank of America Recommends up to 4% Crypto Portfolio Allocation
contentSnippet: The crypto market liked the news, with majors jumping 7-10% on the back of Bank of America's new guidance plus Vanguard's crypto ETF debut.

title: Firelight launches XRP staking protocol on Flare, with stXRP planned to earn rewards through DeFi insurance
contentSnippet: This is Phase 1 of the rollout, so staking rewards aren’t live yet; they are expected to begin in Phase 2, early next year.

title: Axis raises $5 million in round led by Galaxy Ventures to launch onchain yield protocol for USD, bitcoin and gold
contentSnippet: Axis said it has also deployed $100 million in private capital through its closed beta to stress-test its delta-neutral arbitrage engine.

title: UK Passes Digital Assets Bill Recognizing Crypto as Property
contentSnippet: The law gives crypto legal status as property, bolstering protections for users and advancing the UK’s bid to become a digital finance hub.

title: Bitcoin jumps back above $93K as short liquidations and fresh institutional interest help fuel rebound ahead of Fed meeting
contentSnippet: Bitcoin has surged back above $93,000 as traders brace for next week’s Federal Reserve decision amid lingering macro uncertainty.

title: Australian Bitcoin Group Challenges ABC News Over 'Misleading' Coverage
contentSnippet: The ABIB claims that ABC "misrepresented Bitcoin's purpose" and conflated it with criminal activity in its coverage.

title: Binance appoints co-founder Yi He as new co-CEO alongside Richard Teng
contentSnippet: Yi He will lead the company alongside previous solo CEO Richard Teng, the exec announced during Binance Blockchain Week.

title: Cathie Wood’s Ark Invest stocks up on more Coinbase, Bullish and Robinhood shares
contentSnippet: Ark Invest bought another 28,315 Coinbase shares on Tuesday, worth around $7.5 million, as it continued to rebalance its fund weightings.

title: Bitcoin Short-Term Holder Shakeout Could Accelerate Recovery Above Key Level
contentSnippet: A breakout above $93,000 could trigger a short squeeze, analysts say—accelerating Bitcoin’s recovery amid short-term holder capitulation.

title: Investigating DeFi hacks with ‘Code is Law’ co-director James Craig and Wildcat Finance co-founder Laurence Day
contentSnippet: "Code is Law" co-director James Craig and Wildcat Finance co-founder Lawrence Day discuss their experiences with, and the consequences of, major DeFi hacks.

title: Gunmen Steal $85,800 in Trinidad Crypto Ambush as Attacks on Holders Rise
contentSnippet: Armed robberies of crypto buyers are rising globally as criminals abandon digital hacks for brutal in-person confrontations.

title: Anthropic Starts Early IPO Prep Ahead of Possible 2026 Debut: Report
contentSnippet: Anthropic is reportedly exploring a public market debut while chasing a new funding round that could push its valuation past $300 billion.

title: Animoca eyes stablecoins, AI, DePIN as it expands focus in 2026: Exec
contentSnippet: Animoca Brands’ Keyvan Peymani says the Web3 gaming company is exploring all segments of the crypto industry, including DePIN, DeFi and AI.

title: Conor McGregor calls out Khabib over NFTs, gets shut down by ZachXBT
contentSnippet: The former UFC champion tried to launch his own celebrity memecoin, REAL, in April, but the project failed to gain traction.

title: Memecoin market sinks to 2025 low as $5B wiped out in a day
contentSnippet: Both memecoins and NFTs have plunged to their weakest levels since early 2025, with traders pulling back from speculative assets across the board.

title: NFT and memecoin markets recover after month-long crypto slump
contentSnippet: NFTs posted selective gains led by blue chips, while memecoins rallied broadly across major names in a sentiment-driven rebound.

title: NFTs hit the brakes: Market cap tanks 46% in just 30 days
contentSnippet: CoinGecko data shows the NFT market value has nearly halved in a month, with even top collections like BAYC and CryptoPunks losing ground.

title: Valve’s Counter-Strike 2 update crashes $5.8B economy, revives NFT debate
contentSnippet: A major update to Counter-Strike 2’s item mechanics wiped nearly $2 billion from its $5.8 billion skin market, igniting debate over central control in gaming.

title: Coinbase splashes $25M to revive a podcast from the last bull run
contentSnippet: Coinbase has paid $25 million for an NFT that compels the once popular crypto podcast UpOnly to restart. Bull market vibes anyone?

title: OpenSea rejects pivot from NFTs, says it’s evolving to ‘trade everything’
contentSnippet: OpenSea CEO Devin Finzer says the platform isn’t abandoning NFTs but expanding into a universal onchain trading hub.

title: Swiss regulator GESPA takes aim at FIFA’s NFT platform in formal complaint
contentSnippet: Switzerland’s nationwide gambling authority said user rewards on the platform feature the element of chance, categorizing them as gambling.

title: Fear returns to the crypto market as $230B vanishes overnight
contentSnippet: Investor sentiment turned sharply bearish as crypto’s fear index plunged to 28, and $230 billion in value evaporated in a single day.
